channel.title: testimonials on Cali VIP Tours
channel.description: Recent content in testimonials on Cali VIP Tours

item.title: Another satisfied client
item.description: "Has being great! From picking me up on time to bring me to my hotel, show me around all the nice restaurants and bars! Is like having an instant friend here in Colombia". Go Back

item.title: Nice spot
item.description: "Unforgettable! Cali VIP Tours provided me with an experience like no other. From the moment I'd join their guide, It felt like exploring Cali with a close friend. I recommend then to explore Cali in an authentic and memorable way" Go Back

item.title: Somewhere in Chipichape
item.description: "I would definitely go back to Cali again I had an amazing experience, the unique thing about this tour concept is that you don't have a guide, you have a friend that takes you through the real Cali culture. Something that I really like is that depending on your need, they will schedule a tour that fits you the best!" Go Back
